Articles.Content:
Whipped this up in a couple of nights to celebrate and show off the release of my IXS Enterprise Mod later tonight (fingers crossed). It's not the best machinima video ive ever done, but for 2 nights work im rather pleased.

Engineer Spotty delivers Captain Kerkman to his new ship, the KSS Manley....

Hope you guys like it as much as i did putting it together

Hah, you even gave us The Motion Picture tour, just shortened to a bearable length of time

Seriously, the mod is beautiful and the video shows it off nicely. I've yet to download it, but I may do so just to take it for a spin
Kirk Kerman is a Kerbal Name, you know.
Indeed. But Kirk is Kirk Kerman's first name, and Captain Kirk Kerkman or Captain Kirk Kirk sounds just plain silly now, doesnt it?
Awesome video! I wish I could do the same sort of thing for my ships, but alas, my computer isn't very good.
